nfcjlib.core.util

Class CRC16

  • java.lang.Object
    • nfcjlib.core.util.CRC16

  • public class CRC16
extends java.lang.Object
    Compute the CRC16.

    The internal methods #crcA(byte[]) and addByte(int, byte) are based on the scala version created by Tuomas Aura.
